languages.text: "Тут спорить не буду. Мне от всей вываленной на меня тобою святости даже легчает как-то. Виски не так давит, сосредоточиться проще..." {n}Идира пожимает плечами, словно говорит о чем-то не важном.{/n}

"Not gonna argue with that. Whenever you dump another bucket of sanctity on my head, it kind of makes me feel better, strangely. My temples don't ache as much, it's easier to focus..." {n}Idira shrugs as if she is talking about something unimportant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тут спорить не буду. Мне от всей вываленной на меня тобою святости даже легчает как-то. Виски не так давит, сосредоточиться проще..." {n}Идира пожимает плечами, словно говорит о чем-то не важном.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Not gonna argue with that. Whenever you dump another bucket of sanctity on my head, it kind of makes me feel better, strangely. My temples don't ache as much, it's easier to focus..." {n}Idira shrugs like she is talking about something unimportant.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not gonna argue with that. Whenever you dump another bucket of sanctity on my head, it kind of makes me feel better, strangely. My temples don't ache as much, it's easier to focus..." {n}Idira shrugs as if she is talking about something unimportant.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「言い争うつもりはないわ。あなたがサンクティティをあたいの頭の上に捨てる度に気分が良くなるの、奇妙なことにね。あたいの神殿はそこまで傷ついていないから、集中する方がまだ簡単…」{n}イディラはさして重要ではないことを話しているかのように肩をすくめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not gonna argue with that. Whenever you dump another bucket of sanctity on my head, it kind of makes me feel better, strangely. My temples don't ache as much, it's easier to focus..." {n}Idira shrugs as if she is talking about something unimportant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「言い争うつもりはないわ。あなたがサンクティティをあたいの頭の上に捨てる度に気分が良くなるの、奇妙なことにね。あたいの神殿はそこまで傷ついていないから、集中する方がまだ簡単…」{n}イディラはさして重要ではないことを話しているかのように肩をすくめた。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “这句话恐怕没什么好争的。说来也怪，每当你往我头上浇一桶圣水之后，我感觉好像都好了些。太阳穴没那么疼了，也更容易集中注意力了……”{n}伊迪拉耸了耸肩，仿佛在谈论不值一提的事情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not gonna argue with that. Whenever you dump another bucket of sanctity on my head, it kind of makes me feel better, strangely. My temples don't ache as much, it's easier to focus..." {n}Idira shrugs as if she is talking about something unimportant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这句话恐怕没什么好争的。说来也怪，每当你往我头上浇一桶圣水之后，我感觉好像都好了些。太阳穴没那么疼了，也更容易集中注意力了……”{n}伊迪拉耸了耸肩，仿佛在谈论不值一提的事情。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas moi qui vous dirai le contraire. Chaque fois que vous déversez sur ma tête un nouveau tombereau de piété, je me sens étrangement mieux. Mes tempes ne me font plus aussi mal et j'ai moins de difficulté à me concentrer... » {n}Idira hausse les épaules comme si elle évoquait un sujet trivial.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not gonna argue with that. Whenever you dump another bucket of sanctity on my head, it kind of makes me feel better, strangely. My temples don't ache as much, it's easier to focus..." {n}Idira shrugs as if she is talking about something unimportant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas moi qui vous dirai le contraire. Chaque fois que vous déversez sur ma tête un nouveau tombereau de piété, je me sens étrangement mieux. Mes tempes ne me font plus aussi mal et j'ai moins de difficulté à me concentrer... » {n}Idira hausse les épaules comme si elle évoquait un sujet trivial.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No seré yo quien lo discuta. Cada vez que me echa otro cubo de monsergas santurronas, hace que me sienta mejor, por raro que suene. Me duelen menos las sienes, me cuesta menos concentrarme...». {n}Idira se encoge de hombros, como si estuviera hablando de un asunto baladí.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not gonna argue with that. Whenever you dump another bucket of sanctity on my head, it kind of makes me feel better, strangely. My temples don't ache as much, it's easier to focus..." {n}Idira shrugs as if she is talking about something unimportant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No seré yo quien lo discuta. Cada vez que me echa otro cubo de monsergas santurronas, hace que me sienta mejor, por raro que suene. Me duelen menos las sienes, me cuesta menos concentrarme...». {n}Idira se encoge de hombros, como si estuviera hablando de un asunto baladí.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde Euch nicht widersprechen. Wann immer Ihr wieder einen Eimer voller Heiligkeit über meinem Kopf ausleert, fühle ich mich seltsamerweise besser. Meine Schläfen schmerzen weniger, ich kann mich besser konzentrieren ..." {n}Idira zuckt die Schultern, als spräche sie über etwas Unwichtiges.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not gonna argue with that. Whenever you dump another bucket of sanctity on my head, it kind of makes me feel better, strangely. My temples don't ache as much, it's easier to focus..." {n}Idira shrugs as if she is talking about something unimportant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Euch nicht widersprechen. Wann immer Ihr wieder einen Eimer voller Heiligkeit über meinem Kopf ausleert, fühle ich mich seltsamerweise besser. Meine Schläfen schmerzen weniger, ich kann mich besser konzentrieren ..." {n}Idira zuckt die Schultern, als spräche sie über etwas Unwichtiges.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Karşı çıkamayacağım. Beni kutsal söylemlerinle sıkboğaz ettiğinde kendimi ilginç bir şekilde daha iyi hissediyorum. Şakaklarımın ağrısı hafifliyor, daha rahat odaklanıyorum..." {n}İdira, önemsiz bir şeyden bahsediyormuşçasına omuz silkiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not gonna argue with that. Whenever you dump another bucket of sanctity on my head, it kind of makes me feel better, strangely. My temples don't ache as much, it's easier to focus..." {n}Idira shrugs as if she is talking about something unimportant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Karşı çıkamayacağım. Beni kutsal söylemlerinle sıkboğaz ettiğin zaman, kendimi ilginç bir şekilde daha iyi hissediyorum. Şakaklarımın ağrısı hafifliyor, daha rahat odaklanıyorum..." {n}İdira, önemsiz bir şeyden bahsediyormuşçasına omuz silkiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
